thread.title: Christmas parade driver booked into Kern County Jail | News | bakersfield.com
thread.title_full: Christmas parade driver booked into Kern County Jail | News | bakersfield.com

author: MELANIE NGUYEN mnguyen@bakersfield.com
title: Christmas parade driver booked into Kern County Jail | News | bakersfield.com
text:
The man police say was responsible for the Bakersfield Christmas Parade car crash Dec. 7 was booked into a Kern County jail Thursday afternoon after being released from medical care.
Alan Lewis Booth, 72, is suspected of being the driver whose Ford F-150 truck plowed into a group of people and a food truck on H Street and 21st Street minutes before the parade started.
